para.text: After running PEST, you can copy the model files to a new directory and then import the modified model into a new instance of ModelMuse and visual the modified hydraulic conductivity distribution and pumping rate. (Importing a model causes ModelMuse to overwrite the model output files so copy the files to a new directory to prevent that from happening.)
In the modified model the combined estimated pumping rates of the two wells making up the seepage pond is 0.023 m
/s which is less than the actual pumping rate of 0.025 m
A diagram of the estimated distribution of Kx is shown below.

image.title: Diagram displaying the estimated distribution of Kx.
image.caption: Diagram displaying the estimated distribution of Kx.

para.text: The true distribution from the model used to generate the observed values for the parameter estimation exercise is shown below.

image.title: Diagram displaying the true distribution of Kx.
image.caption: Diagram displaying the true distribution of Kx.

para.text: The true hydraulic conductivity distribution has more extreme hydraulic conductivities than any of the estimated hydraulic conductivities.
